reviewText: Cute christian dvd for kids. Not quite up to the Veggie Tales quality, but the kids liked it. I used it during a lesson in October and it was great for what I used it for, but not one the kids would just pick to randomly watch all the time.

Kids need more entertainment like this.  Finally, a company that cares about the gospel being spread to the younger generation in an exciting and funny way.  Truly the story of Jesus is the greatest gift a child could have.
